item.author: akira.uestc@gmail.com (Akira)
item.description:
About

Welcome! I’m Akira, a passionate developer and technology enthusiast based in East Asia. I enjoy building elegant, efficient, and meaningful software that solves real-world problems.

üë®‚Äçüíª Who I Am

I’m a software engineer with interests spanning:

  • Embedded systems and low-level programming (C/C++, Rust)
  • Linux systems and kernel customization
  • Web development and frontend/backend integration
  • IoT, robotics, and computer vision
  • Open-source contribution and community projects

I believe in learning by doing and constantly push myself to explore new technologies and frameworks.
